name: Auditory
description:
From the 2018 Spooky Game Jam, this game is about escaping an unknown area. Pass through each door by searching for the correct voice but be warned, because they are not alone. Use the surrounding sounds to escape from its powerful grasp!

Needs a controller to play.

How to Play

Move Right Analog Stick to listen for hints.

Select door with DPad (Left, Up, and Right)

Team Credit

Don Herweg - Programmer
David Wales - Programmer
Andy Bagdady - Artist
Eric Moen - Designer/Sound Designer
Daniel Song - Designer/Producer

Special Thanks

Kailey Mitchell - Voice Actress
